title: Area to be handed over to the Local Planing Authority and area to be retained with the Project Proponent/s as per AR Regulations shall be an integral part of ITP and area / construction allowed to the Project Proponent/s may be developed anywhere within the ITP boundary
clause_text: Area to be handed over to the Local Planing Authority and area to be retained with the Project Proponent/s as per AR Regulations shall be an integral part of ITP and area / construction allowed to the Project Proponent/s may be developed anywhere within the ITP boundary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
